message.content:
cs.DC, cs.Distributed, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.SY 

Reasoning: The paper discusses an approach to handle errors, asynchrony, and faults in an MPI application, which falls under the category of distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also mentions the integration with MPI-ULFM, which is a proposal for extending MPI towards fault tolerance, indicating a focus on fault tolerance and system reliability (cs.SY). The use of C++ and exceptions suggests a focus on programming languages and compilers (cs.PL) and software engineering (cs.SE).
